1.title: Concept Space vs Action Space
1.summary: A look into what happens when we mix up descriptive categories with prescriptive ones. Problems from the same category may still have different solutions, and recognizing the similarities is insufficient for a solution.

2.title: Fading Novelty
2.summary: Fading novelty refers to when new things become old and dull after repetition. It shows up everywhere in life, from songs to foods. I also think it plays a negative role in learning, and I propose an attitude to combat this.

3.title: Recognizing vs Generating
3.summary: Two core ways to categorize tasks are Recognizing and Generating. Though they may seem similar, I think the difference is in the amount of effort involved. This framework is useful for noticing when a proposed solution is going to be effective or not.
